0.5.name: wordpress/linksextractor
0.5.description:
This plugin print all links in a post at the bottom of the post. This is usefull when you would like to have a print version, so without this plugin you see on the paper only the underlined link but, you don't know where the link is going to.

The linkextractor solv this problem. After installing the plugin it will print out the links at the bottom and also on your printed version.
